meta.title: The Last Ember of Balance
meta.notes: Avatar-inspired adventure. Classical era tone, mystical and introspective. Player is the Avatar, traveling with a trusted friend and Appa. Abilities 0–30 (sum 120), skill thresholds 10/20/25. Multiple endings.

rules.check: total = d20 + floor(ability/5); success if total >= dc
rules.win_condition: Reach a positive ending with all abilities > 0

scenes.title: Auroras on the Tide
scenes.description: Your friend nudges you awake on Appa’s saddle. Below, a fishing village lights a signal fire twice—once in the present, once a breath behind.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. Cookfires paint small suns in the night; laughter hides worry.

choices.option: Guide Appa down through the crosswinds

success.narration: You read the gusts and land soft as a feather.

failure.narration: A downdraft jostles you; Appa grunts and corrects.

choices.option: Lean into the harness and keep steady

success.narration: Your strength steadies the reins; Appa rumbles approval.

failure.narration: A strap bites your palm; you manage.

scenes.title: Village of Two Shadows
scenes.description: Fisherfolk describe nets catching yesterday’s fish and tomorrow’s foam. An elder asks the Avatar for help.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. Cookfires paint small suns in the night; laughter hides worry.

choices.option: Listen deeply to the elder’s tale

success.narration: Their relief is a warmth against the cold.

failure.narration: They sense hurry in you and worry more.

choices.option: Inspect the beach for unusual tides

success.narration: You chart a tide of spirit-light refracting in the surf.

failure.narration: Only salt, kelp, and gull-temper remain.

scenes.title: Rift on the Shore
scenes.description: Where waves break, a glassy seam hangs over wet stones. Small fish flicker through and come out different sizes.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Sense the rift’s rhythm (Attunement)

success.narration: It pulses with fear, then curiosity. It knows you.

failure.narration: It stutters; your heartbeat speeds in sympathy.

choices.option: Test with a driftwood probe

success.narration: The wood ages into drift-polished bone in a blink.

failure.narration: Your notes smear with sea-spray; uncertain.

scenes.title: Divide the Work
scenes.description: Your friend rolls their shoulders: 'You take the spirits, I’ll handle people? Or the other way around?'
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Cookfires paint small suns in the night; laughter hides worry.

choices.option: You: spirits; Friend: villagers

success.narration: They grin: 'Go be mysterious. I’ll fetch tea and calm folks.'

failure.narration: You hesitate; your friend improvises anyway.

choices.option: You: villagers; Friend: spirits

success.narration: You steady the crowd while your friend steps toward the seam.

failure.narration: Your voice cracks in the wind; faces tense.

scenes.title: Calm at the Fireline
scenes.description: Children whisper that the moon blinked. The elder asks if Appa bites.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. Cookfires paint small suns in the night; laughter hides worry.

choices.option: Reassure with humor and warmth

success.narration: Laughter thawed; even the elder chuckles.

failure.narration: Some smiles come late; fear lingers.

choices.option: Organize a safe perimeter and tasks

success.narration: Structure gives courage; lanterns mark a circle.

failure.narration: Plans muddle in the wind; you adjust on the fly.

scenes.title: A Seal of Moonlight
scenes.description: On a nearby islet, a shy otter-seal spirit peeks between ripples, whiskers bright with stars.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

success.narration: It chirrs and noses your palm; trust kindles.

failure.narration: It vanishes with a splash; patience, perhaps.

choices.option: Hum a steady note to match the tide

success.narration: The seam smooths for a heartbeat; the spirit listens.

failure.narration: Your note wavers; the seam ripples.

scenes.title: Friend’s Signal
scenes.description: Your friend waves from the seam, holding a lantern that burns blue twice.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: A slip soaks your boot; you laugh it off.

choices.option: Call Appa to anchor the rope

success.narration: Appa pulls; the rope sings taut.

scenes.description: You and your friend step together; for a blink you are children, then elders, then yourselves again.

success.narration: Names thread you to the now.

failure.narration: Words tangle; your friend squeezes your hand.

scenes.title: Blessing of the Otter-Seal
scenes.description: The spirit bobs, then splashes a crescent of silver over you and Appa.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Accept the blessing with gratitude

failure.narration: You shiver; gratitude still warms.

choices.option: Ask for guidance to the source

success.narration: It points a whisker toward a canyon far inland.

failure.narration: It only blinks; you trust your path.

scenes.title: Northward on the Wind
scenes.description: Appa bellows happily. You and your friend nestle under furs as stars wheel above.
scenes.background: Sea-ice groans under distant auroras; the wind tastes of salt and old stories. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly.

choices.option: Chart a course by stars and memory

success.narration: Constellations nudge you toward the canyon.

failure.narration: Clouds smudge patterns; you rely on instinct.

choices.option: Doze in turns to keep watch

success.narration: You wake clear-headed at dawn.

failure.narration: You wake stiff; the sunrise helps.

scenes.title: Gate of the Split Canyon
scenes.description: A canyon splits the land like a page torn corner to corner. Wind runs both directions.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls.

choices.option: Listen for the heart of the wind

success.narration: Two rhythms become one path in your mind.

failure.narration: The song won't settle; you commit anyway.

choices.option: Slide down on sand like water

success.narration: You surf the slope; your friend whoops.

failure.narration: Sand finds your boots; you cough and grin.

scenes.title: Footprints that Argue
scenes.description: Your footprints point two ways at once. A fox spirit watches from a ledge.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Offer food and respect to the fox

failure.narration: It sneezes and vanishes; perhaps later.

choices.option: Trace the eddies and pick the safer trail

success.narration: Small stones reveal a pattern of safer steps.

failure.narration: You second-guess; pace slows.

scenes.title: Bridge of Whispers
scenes.description: A rope bridge mutters in many voices: your own, your friend’s, strangers’.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: Ropes burn your palms; you hiss and continue.

choices.option: Match the murmurs with your breath (Attunement)

success.narration: The voices braid into a single hum; the bridge steadies.

failure.narration: Discord scrapes your spine; you make it across anyway.

scenes.title: Lintel of Names
scenes.description: At the canyon’s heart, a cave mouth bears four symbols: wave, flame, stone, wind.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky.

choices.option: Examine the order of symbols

success.narration: You spot scuff marks in the wind rune: entry code.

failure.narration: Dust sneezes happen twice; you learn little.

choices.option: Press the stone and push

success.narration: The lintel lifts with a groan.

failure.narration: It sticks; your shoulders will remember.

scenes.title: Temple of Turning Steps
scenes.description: Inside, steps spiral up and down at the same time. Candles burn sideways.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: Ash flicks your cheek; you blink and adjust.

choices.option: Cartwheel between platforms (Acrobatics)

success.narration: Your body remembers joy; you land grinning.

failure.narration: A knee twinges; you laugh it off.

scenes.title: Four Doors, Four Questions
scenes.description: Four doors breathe gently: Water, Fire, Earth, Air. Each asks a different part of you.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: Ripples answer slowly; you persist.

choices.option: Fire: kindle your courage

success.narration: A coal winks; your breath becomes a bellows.

failure.narration: Heat nips; you steady anyway.

choices.option: Earth: anchor without stubbornness

success.narration: Your stance finds the mountain in your bones.

failure.narration: Pebbles rattle; you reset your feet.

choices.option: Air: move without clinging

success.narration: You step where the draft invites.

failure.narration: You overthink; then you flow.

scenes.title: Room of Water’s Memory
scenes.description: Images skim the pool: times you could have spoken kinder.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: A tightness remains, but you keep going.

choices.option: Promise better and mean it (Performance)

success.narration: Your vow rings true in the water.

failure.narration: Words feel thin; resolve survives.

scenes.title: Room of Fire’s Patience

scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

success.narration: The fire bows; you feel taller inside.

failure.narration: Sparks question you; you answer later.

choices.option: Stand your ground inside the heat (Endurance)

success.narration: Sweat stings; you do not flinch.

failure.narration: The heat bites; pride steadies you.

scenes.title: Room of Earth’s Listening

scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: A pebble scolds; you smile and adjust.

choices.option: Lift a pillar just enough, not more

failure.narration: Your hands ache; the pillar nods anyway.

scenes.title: Room of Air’s Laughter

scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: You trip and bow dramatically.

choices.option: Breathe until breath breathes you

success.narration: Inhale, exhale, vanish, return.

failure.narration: Thoughts chatter; you thank them and continue.

scenes.title: Stair to the Veil
scenes.description: The steps vibrate like a plucked string. Appa snorts softly outside.
scenes.background: Stormlight flickers on canyon walls; every echo sounds like a memory learning to speak. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Call to Appa for courage

success.narration: He bellows; your friend pats your shoulder.

failure.narration: Your voice echoes twice; Appa answers once.

choices.option: Focus your center for the crossing

success.narration: Your heartbeat and the stair’s note match.

failure.narration: You find the note late but firm.

scenes.title: Edge of the Veil
scenes.description: The world thins. Colors lean toward music.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Leaves sign with the wind; small spirits peep from bark and root. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Step through hand-in-hand with your friend

success.narration: Your bond threads you safely across.

failure.narration: Fingers slip then clasp again; lesson learned.

choices.option: Go first to anchor the way

success.narration: You become a lantern to follow.

failure.narration: You wobble, then hold.

scenes.title: Forest of Returning Paths
scenes.description: Trees grow in spirals; paths return you gently to where you need to be.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Leaves sign with the wind; small spirits peep from bark and root. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

success.narration: It bows and trots ahead.

failure.narration: It yawns and vanishes; perhaps more patience.

choices.option: Sense the current beneath the ground

scenes.title: River of Remembering
scenes.description: Water flows both ways at once. Reflections show who you’ve been kind to.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Leaves sign with the wind; small spirits peep from bark and root. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: Your voice trembles; the river listens anyway.

choices.option: Wade carefully and keep your breath steady

success.narration: Cold bites, but you are steady as a rock.

failure.narration: A stumble chills your bones.

scenes.title: Bridge of Light Reeds
scenes.description: Thin reeds weave themselves into steps at your approach.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Leaves sign with the wind; small spirits peep from bark and root. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: The song thins; you hurry, hearts loud.

scenes.title: Lake of Honest Sky
scenes.description: A still lake shows not your face but your possibilities.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Leaves sign with the wind; small spirits peep from bark and root. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Bow to each possibility and let it go

success.narration: The lake smiles, if a lake can smile.

failure.narration: A stubborn image lingers; you breathe it away.

choices.option: Reach for the one that helps your friend now

success.narration: A path appears where none stood.

failure.narration: The lake waits; you learn to wait too.

scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: A gust jostles you; balance returns.

scenes.title: Peak Where Winds Meet
scenes.description: Four small shrines ring a platform of cloud-stone. A great spirit sleeps beneath.
scenes.background: The Spirit World breathes in colors your eyes nearly remember; time drifts like petals. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

failure.narration: Ash smudges your fingers; effort matters.

choices.option: Meditate until the world blinks with you

success.narration: Breath becomes wind; wind becomes breath.

failure.narration: Thoughts fidget; you smile and try again.

scenes.title: The Heart Spirit Wakes
scenes.description: A vast turtle-lion spirit opens an eye the size of a moon. Time hiccups once, then waits.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Ask what it needs, not what you want

success.narration: Its whiskers tremble: 'Balance asks listening.'

failure.narration: It yawns, testing your patience.

choices.option: State your purpose with steady courage

success.narration: 'Your voice is young and true,' it rumbles.

failure.narration: Echoes of doubt return from the clouds.

scenes.title: Trials of the Fourfold Breath
scenes.description: Four breaths circle you: Soften (Water), Kindle (Fire), Hold (Earth), Let Go (Air).
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Soften what is rigid (Water)

success.narration: A frozen wave flows again.

failure.narration: It creaks; you coax, learning patience.

choices.option: Kindle what is dim (Fire)

success.narration: A small flame stands tall without burning.

failure.narration: Smoke stings; you blink and continue.

choices.option: Hold what is precious (Earth)

success.narration: You lift just enough, no more.

failure.narration: Your grip trembles, then steadies.

choices.option: Let go of what clings (Air)

success.narration: You laugh and the wind joins.

failure.narration: A snag releases; you bow to it.

scenes.title: Gate to the Avatar State
scenes.description: The shrines glow together. The spirit nods toward a circle of wind and light.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Enter gently, with humility

success.narration: The power welcomes rather than overwhelms.

failure.narration: It takes effort to keep balance as power arrives.

choices.option: Enter fiercely, with purpose

success.narration: Power answers power; the circle sings.

failure.narration: A flare nips at your edges; you are still you.

scenes.title: The Knot in the Wind
scenes.description: The canyon’s rift spins at the center of the sky. Your past missteps and future fears whisper like a crowded room.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls. failure.narration: A slip; you recover with care next step.

choices.option: Hold still until the wind remembers itself (Willpower)

success.narration: Stillness teaches the storm its shape.

failure.narration: Stillness costs you; breath returns slow.

scenes.title: Breath After the Storm
scenes.description: Appa circles once. Your friend grips your arm, eyes bright. The world listens for your choice.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls. failure.narration: Your words come a heartbeat too late; small eddies remain.

choices.option: Reshape the flow toward compassion

success.narration: The rift becomes a gentler seam; learning can pass.

failure.narration: Intent wobbles; not all will agree.

choices.option: Bind the rift tight and pay the cost

success.narration: You offer a piece of your flame to seal it.

failure.narration: The seal holds for now, imperfectly.

scenes.title: Ending: Harmony on the Wind
scenes.description: Villagers find their nets full of the present. Fox spirits nap in sun patches. Appa sneezes and everyone laughs.

scenes.title: Ending: The Gentle Seam
scenes.description: The rift softens into a passage used with care. Stories and small spirits cross; both worlds grow kinder.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Promise to visit and learn

success.narration: The otter-seal spirit splashes a tiny crown of water.

scenes.title: Ending: The Offered Flame
scenes.description: Balance returns, but you feel a quiet place inside that needs time to regrow. Your friend squeezes your hand. Appa nuzzles your shoulder.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Thin air rings like a bell; prayer flags write poems to the sky. The air smells like lightning and plums; colors taste like notes of a flute.

choices.option: Rest and listen to the wind

scenes.title: Ending: A Slight Tilt
scenes.description: The world is mostly right, but shadows run a step late on certain days. You have more work ahead.
scenes.background: All four winds meet and hold their breath; the world waits for your next heartbeat. Frost smokes from Appa's breath as he rumbles low and friendly. Sand hisses like soft rain; stone remembers footfalls.

scenes.title: Ending: Frozen Breath
